Key Match Events: Utah Jazz pulled out a win during crunch time against the Dallas Mavericks
Key buckets and defensive stops came in the final minutes to secure the win
Utah closed with Keyonte George and Kyle Filipowski on the floor, two 21-year-olds adjusting to life in the pros
Post-Match Reflections: Will Hardy said following Thursday’s win over the Dallas Mavericks that there’s a lot to be proud of with the team from a growth standpoint
Hardy wants his young squad to focus on the importance of mental stability
Collins said Thursday that going through late-game situations is always good for their basketball minds, especially for the younger guys
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Utah Jazz rotation currently features as many as six players age 23 or younger on any given night
The team is 2-1 in clutch games this season with a slightly positive net-rating

Thursday’s win was the third in the last five games for the Jazz following a relatively comfortable road win against the Chicago Bulls on Nov. 4 and another nail-biter against the San Antonio Spurs on Nov. 9
Others: The NBA defines clutch time situations as the final five minutes of regulation or overtime when the score is within five points
